metadata.title: CVE-2020-28491 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: This affects the packagecom.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat:jackson-dataformat-cbor from 0 and before2.11.4, from 2.12.0-rc1 and before 2.12.1. Unchecked allocation of bytebuffer can cause a java.lang.OutOfMemoryError exception.

criterions.comment: jackson-dataformat-cbor package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
